archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Courses Hub - operational data store
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: A future, planned, standardised, aggregated data service combining data about UWE taught courses such as current programmes and modules and students and staff registered/teaching on courses. To be implemented as part of the target SOA hybrid integration architecture. The courses entity (and related entities) will be defined in the Enterprise Data Dictionary. RESTful API's will support security controlled access to student information for those systems that need ot use it.
